attributes.action: The British Public call for an immediate early election
attributes.additional_details: If those in Parliment does not stand up for the rights of The individuals of Britian by allowing an immediate fair vote, it too is treasonous towards The Citizens and Taxpayers of The United Kingdom. The Government moto has always been "By The People For The People" and so we call for an immediate re election. It is obvious from this Covid-19 has been exaggerated from the start and the public misinformed and manipulated concerning the virus. The Goverment has shown itself to be irresponsible
attributes.background: The Taxpaying British Public demand an immediate re vote and early election without underhanded tactics such as making last minute deals with other parties to gain votes. The Government is showing signs of tyrany, incompetence, embezzlement and is not fit for purpose.
